alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden, northeastern Leon, southeastern Decatur and southwestern Grady Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havana, Midway, Tallahassee, Quincy, Freemont, Macon Community Park, Littman, Darsey, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Laingkat, Calvary, Killearn Estates, Shady Rest, Amsterdam, Branchville, Hinson, Dogtown and Forest Meadows Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
